@YhiGhielgi You really need to re-evaluate what you think NTR is. This author's bread and butter *IS* NTR. This is written with the intention to be NTR...so maybe you realize you're wrong about what you THINK qualifies as NTR. No, they don't have to be in a relationship. They just have to have feelings for each other or at least strongly implied. Protip: The meaning of the Japanese word "Netorare" and NTR as a genre aren't COMPLETELY the same. Related, but not the same. MC has his childhood friend that clearly loves him back stolen? NTR.
@7 Eyes Like I've said before...it just shows how these stores require a weak-minded idiotic FMC to "work".

I'll never understand why anyone on this site feels like they have to come to the comment section and either insult a genre they don't like or the people that do, and for whatever reason it's only on the NTR, Vanilla, and occasionally loli chapters.  There are literally tags so you can take one look and immediately know what you're about to witness, at which point you either fap to it or just be on your way.  It's like the two sides of the NTR vs Vanilla argument are both secretly into the other and have to make a spectacle to maintain appearances.  I can't imagine why else either of you would actually read the entirety of the other's chapters before commenting if you really hated it that much.  Just admit that sometimes you get tired of pure relationships or infinite cucking and want a change of pace.
